image.altText: VoteCompass thumb

props.synopsis:
Vote Compass is back to help you understand the Australian political landscape.Â 

You put in your postcode to narrow down to your electorate, answer 30 questions, and can explore the results to see how your views compare with parties and politicians.

Unlike a traditional poll, the aim of Vote Compass is to get Australians thinking about public policy, rather than predicting who might win the election.

title.children: Compare your view with parties and politicians using Vote Compass
